title: Interpretation of a dream about coal: seeing ashes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Coal - Interpretation of a dream about coal for a single woman - Interpretation of a dream about collecting coal - Coal in a dream - Buying coal in a dream - Eating coal in a dream - Interpretation of a dream about coal and incense - Interpretation of consuming coal in a dream by Ibn Sirin - Coal in a dream for a single woman - Interpretation of coal in a dream - Ibn Sirin says: Coal in a dream is from trees, and in the interpretation there is a dangerous person, and he adds: Coal is forbidden. Money, which is help from the Lord. Unused charcoal looks like ash, so it is frowned upon, faked, or hated. As for the coal used in fuel, it is an indication of the multiplicity of voices a person has in his work because of the benefits it brings. Coal: which is suitable for fuel, and it is a waiting period for its owner for this work in which coal is included. Qatar: Also a protection kit and a shield from the Sultan because it protects ships from water. If you dream that you are trading firewood, it means that you will gain wealth from the upcoming fight. If you dream that you are in a coal mine and you see miners, it means that some evil will focus its power on destroying you. But if You dreamed of obtaining a share in a coal mine, this means guaranteed returns from some business. If a girl dreams that she is mining coal, this foretells that she will become the wife of a real estate dealer or a dentist. It is said that Saif bin Di Yazan (516 AD - 574 AD) saw a fire in his sleep. It descended from the sky over the land of Eden, and fell on every one of its houses, extinguishing itself until it became coal. . When he narrated that vision of crossing his kingdom, they answered him: Abyssinia occupies his land and kingdom, so it happened after a while. Interpretation of ashes in a dream: It was mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation that ashes are forbidden, and in the interpretation there is a suspicious livelihood that the dreamer takes from the ruler, and he is tired as a result of the Sultan and his entourage. It was also said: Ash is knowledge that has no benefit, or it is a false statement and slander. Whoever sees in his dream as if he is lighting a furnace or lighting a fire in his house, he will benefit from his money or his children. Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of ashes: Whoever strikes a furnace without ashes will marry someone without ashes. Goodness in it.Interpretation of an astrologer in a dream. Mines: Seeing them indicates solidarity with those with breasts who are aware of their conditions. Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream Waseem Youssef - YouTube

title: Interpretation of the meaning of a bed in a dream: Seeing a bed in a dream

preview.html: We offer you to sit on the bed for a single girl married to a pregnant woman, a black white bed, a child’s bed, she sleeps on a bed with a man I know. Seeing the bed in a dream, and the bed indicates everything that a person goes through and refers to, that is, if an unmarried person sees the bed in his dream, this means that he He will get married, and this is if he is sitting on it. As for the married man, if his bed is clean and beautiful, this means that his wife is obedient, loyal, and comfortable. If he sees in his dream that he is sitting on a messy and unclean bed, this means that his wife will not make him comfortable in his life with her. And the bed is in a dream The sick person is approaching death, and as for whoever sees in his dream his bed broken or taken apart, this means that his affairs will be separated and what is good now. Rest disappears, and he gets tired and tired. For example, he is fired from his job or leaves his wife, whether separation (divorce), death, or travel and wilderness. Seeing the bed untidy, unclean, and uncomfortable in a dream means that one will soon become ill. A change for this person in his work or life for the better. The bed in the dream of an unmarried girl. Seeing a bed in the dream of an unmarried woman or an unmarried woman indicates the approaching marriage, as the bed is a symbol of the husband in one dream, and for an unmarried woman to see a clean, tidy and comfortable bed. Her dream indicates her high status with the groom and his respect for her in the future. If the bed that she saw was unclean and untidy, this indicates that the groom does not suit her and is not at her level. An unmarried girl who sees a clean white bed in her dream indicates that this groom has an important job and Holder of a prestigious position. Seeing a bed in a married woman’s dream. A bed in a married woman’s dream indicates her status with her husband. The bed in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for a pregnant woman who sees a bed in her dream or sitting on a bed, this is a sign of the gender of her fetus, meaning that seeing a narrow bed means that she will give birth. Male. Seeing a white bed in a dream. The interpreters said that seeing a white bed in a dream indicates psychological calm, comfort, and stability. For an unmarried girl, this means a son-in-law who has great importance and status, and for a married woman, this means that she has a great status in her husband. His heart and also shows his appreciation and respect for her. Seeing yourself sitting on a bed in a dream Whoever dreams that he is sitting on a bed, if this person is single, he will get married soon. In general, scientists said that the dream of sitting on a bed in a dream is an indication of the end of problems, their solution, and the beginning of a life Free of worries and sorrows and full of joy, joy and happiness. Sleeping with someone in bed in a dream With regard to a person’s dream of sleeping next to someone he knows in a bed in a dream, this indicates that there will be a lineage relationship and mingling or sharing work or sharing the inheritance between these two people. As for Whoever sees himself sleeping on a bed next to someone he does not know, this means that he is traveling and far from his homeland, homeland, and family.Interpretation of the dream in bed - YouTubeInterpretation of the dream of sleeping in bed - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about watermelon in a dream and seeing yourself eating red watermelon

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about watermelon and what it means to see eating watermelon in a dream from Ibn Sirin and many great dream interpreters. Seeing watermelon in a dream expresses many events and changes and we will present this in detail on the True Dreams website through the following lines. Follow us. Interpretations of a dream about watermelon cause Seeing watermelon in a dream causes a lot of confusion and anxiety for people. This is because watermelon is one of the summer fruits that everyone loves and contains water that greatly benefits the body. It has an interesting shape, green on the outside and red on the inside, with black seeds inside. This makes interpretations vary. Much is the case of watermelon, as well as the case in which the fortuneteller is, so the details must be known in order to have a clear and honest opinion. Seeing watermelon in a dream Seeing the sky raining watermelon is a sign of the status, prestige and power that a person will gain in his next life. Seeing an Indian watermelon and giving it to people Evidence that the dreamer is not loved. If he sees watermelon in a dream and the fortuneteller casts magic on the person, it expresses the ineffectiveness of the magic. While the dream of red, immature watermelon represents goodness, recovery from illness, and entering into a new relationship that gains goodness. Many interpretive scholars agreed that the dream of watermelon Green, which is red on the inside, is good news, success, and fulfillment of desires for all people. Read also: Bananas in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream of red watermelon in a dream. Seeing ripe red watermelon in a dream indicates the maturity and health of the person who sees it. Therefore, this vision brings a lot of good livelihood. Abundance and happiness for the dreamer, according to the dreamer’s condition, whether male or female. In the event that a man sees a red watermelon, this is evidence that he will get a job or a promotion at work and a very broad living in the future. In the event that a single woman sees a red watermelon, this is a sign of a happy marriage. And the fulfillment of desires in the future. A married woman has evidence of childbearing and a happy life, and a pregnant woman has evidence that she will give birth soon and enjoy good health. Many interpretation scholars also agree that red watermelon is evidence of many livelihoods and the fulfillment of ambitions and desires. Eating watermelon in a dream. Because watermelon is one of the distinctive fruits of all people, there are some types of watermelon that are not loved, especially Indian watermelon, and because it is cold and has an unpleasant taste. Therefore, seeing the dreamer eating a ripe watermelon in a dream is evidence of the treatment of diseases and the end of debts and problems that a person will face in his next life. If the dreamer sees that he is eating watermelon in the summer and feels happy, this is a sign of happy news. Perhaps the vision indicates that the dreamer will change his life for the better, stability and integration into the relationship with others. I see: Interpretation of a dream about eating mango and watermelon in a dream Watermelon is a little different from watermelon, but it is also a fruit It is common and its vision requires explanation. If one sees that he has finished eating yellow watermelon, this is evidence of recovery from the disease and the elimination of the disease.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a supermarket in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a supermarket in a dream. Dream interpretation teacher is one of the sciences in which many imams of interpretation excelled, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Al-Sadiq, and others. It has many connotations that reflect on the woman, man, or fortune teller in general, so in the following lines of this article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing the supermarket in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of the supermarket in a dream Interpretation scholars went on to say many clues and references for what seeing the supermarket in a dream means. in general. Direct Therefore, the interpretation of a dream about a supermarket in a dream is as follows: Interpretation of a dream about a supermarket: If the dreamer sees himself in the supermarket, the dream may indicate wealth and a lot of money that the dreamer will receive in the coming days. The dream can also mean obtaining a job opportunity A new or promotion in a job and achieving the job that the dreamer had planned for his life. If the dreamer sees an empty store in the dream, this dream may mean that the dreamer may face difficult times in his life, which will make him feel upset. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself shopping in a store, he may The dream means justice, religion and closeness to God in reality. A dream about shopping in a supermarket often indicates prosperity of the business and that the money of the businessman will increase in the dream. If the dreamer sees a supermarket in a dream, and it is full of people and there are many businesses, then this dream can It means that the dreamer gets more and more tired in life and finds food. To dream of buying something in the book market means that the dreamer will have integrity, direction and hard work in his life. If the dreamer buys from the gold market in the dream, it means the dreamer’s joy, marriage and happy events in Reality. The dream of buying many things from the supermarket indicates that the dreamer’s life is comfortable and stable, and the financial situation is very stable. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing pants in a dream and what does it show? Interpretation of dreams of buying sweets from the supermarket for single womenIf a single girl sees herself buying Candy or some supplies from the supermarket, this vision has many different meanings between good and evil. The supermarket for individuals is as follows: Seeing a single girl shopping in the supermarket portends a positive change in the girl’s life and hope in the coming days. The dream can mean that the girl will hear good news in the near future, which will bring her happiness and peace. Also, if a single woman dreams that she is shopping In the supermarket, it may mean that she will get married or engaged in the next few days. The dream can also indicate good news that heralds the achievement of desired goals, fulfillment of expectations and success in real life. If an unmarried girl sees the supermarket in a dream, it may mean escaping Of the problems that the girl was facing at this time, as well as her liberation from the pain that plagued her life. Interpretation of a dream about a supermarket: If the girl sees herself in the supermarket and wants to buy...

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth in a dream for a single woman Seeing the birth of an unmarried girl in a dream is a good sign. The vision indicates a new beginning in both academic and practical life. It may indicate that there is a love relationship with a young man of high morals who is planning to get married. Childbirth indicates happy occasions, it is good news for the fiancée Her wedding is coming. Giving birth to a beautiful child in a dream for singles When an unmarried woman dreams that she gave birth to a beautiful child and the smile appears in a dream on the good character of the future husband. As for the one who saw it? A bloody child in her dream is evidence of her husband's bad morals and the unhappiness he will experience. Giving birth to a sick or dead child in a dream Seeing the birth of a child will In a dream, an unmarried woman is a sign that she will marry a man far from God Almighty and many sins and transgressions. What if she sees that she gave birth to a child? In the care of God Almighty or died in her womb during pregnancy indicates her marriage to a violent and abnormal man who causes her severe pain and misery, the vision in both cases is a warning and a banner. Wait in choosing a life partner. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream When a girl dreams She is also pregnant in a dream, indicating problems and concerns for her and her family in the near future. Giving birth to twins for a single girl in a dream If a girl dreams that she gave birth to twins in a dream, this indicates kindness and a lot of nourishment. If the twins are a boy and a girl, this is evidence of engagement from her lover, but it was not completed due to many problems. Whatever the male duo is, it is a sign of committing sins and disobedience, and she must re-examine herself and repent to God Almighty. The meaning of a dream of giving birth without pain in a dream When a girl dreams that she is giving birth comfortably and without pain during sleep, this is a sign of marriage to a good and righteous man, and she will live with him in prosperity and happiness. Returns to a stable married life and gives birth to righteous offspring. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

The vision indicates a new beginning in both scientific and practical life. It may indicate that there is a love relationship with a young man with high morals who plans to marry. Childbirth indicates happy occasions, as it is good news for the fiancée’s wedding. Coming. The birth of a beautiful child in a dream for single people. When an unmarried woman dreams that she gave birth to a beautiful child. Smiling in a dream indicates the good behavior of the future husband. As for who saw it? A bloody child. The creation in her dream is evidence of her husband’s bad morals and the unhappiness he will experience. The birth of a sick or dead child in a dream. Seeing the birth of a child will in a dream, An unmarried woman is a sign that she will marry a man far from Almighty God and many transgressions and sins. Under the protection of God Almighty, or she dies in her womb during pregnancy, it indicates her marriage to a violent and unnatural man who will cause her severe pain and misery. The vision In both cases, it is a warning and a banner. Wait in choosing a life partner. If the twins are a boy and a girl, this is evidence of an engagement with her lover, but it was not completed due to many problems. Whatever the male couple is, it is a sign of committing sins and disobedience, and she must re-examine herself and repent to God Almighty. The meaning of a dream about giving birth without pain in a dream When you dream of a girl giving birth, the birth was comfortable and without pain During sleep, this is a sign of marrying a good and righteous man, and you will live with him in prosperity and happiness. He will return to a stable married life and give birth to good offspring. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a shipwreck in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Al-Zaghrouda, or Al-Halla, is also called in the Gulf Al-Yabab or “Al-Kharkhara”, and Al-Mars is the sounds made when moving the tongue horizontally and in a row inside the mouth. Women usually sing at weddings, weddings, and happy occasions such as circumcision, returning from Hajj, and commemorating the birth of the Prophet. In other cases, women chant in times of war to motivate soldiers or when receiving the bodies of martyrs. The hymn has psychological meanings in a dream, as it expresses the release of negative energy hidden in the depths of the human soul, and the interpretation of hymns in a dream according to the mood of the dreamer and sometimes according to the spiritual or cultural structure that forms consciousness or awareness. The general interpretation of Al-Zaghrouda in a dream The worship of females goes back to an ancient pagan tradition where women with strong and beautiful necks used to chant as a form of praise to the gods. As for the Levant, women chant the word “Aha”, which carries a blessing in the Syriac and Aramaic languages. It is called “Mahaha” and means begging and its origin is the call of camels for food. The dream is an indication of goodness or livelihood, if performed in a beautiful and harmonious voice. The people of North Africa (Egypt, Libya, Tunisia, Algeria and Morocco) have known the song since the time of the Berbers as a form of expressing joy and happiness, and Homer mentioned it expressing his great admiration for this phenomenon that was not familiar to the Greeks and Romans. According to the modern psychological approach familiar in anthropology, worship is considered a positive symbol in dreams for several reasons, the first of which is that it releases negative energy when heard or played, thus charging the soul with alternative energy that pushes it towards optimism. The trigger in a dream expresses happiness or joy in the future. The trigger in the Arab region is common among women and is a form of expressing joy, and causing a dream can indicate marriage or an imminent marriage, and it can also indicate success, excellence or something similar. Bad in a pregnant woman's dream In some Arab cities and capitals, especially in the Maghreb, women utter three loud screams to express their joy at the birth of a man. The sounds are loud and multiple because the newborn, God willing, will be a boy. As if he is coming from far away, then the boy, God willing, is a girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of morals in a single dream The ululation or the ring in a single dream is a positive sign, because it sometimes expresses good news on the way to it, and sometimes the ululation indicates an engagement or a close marriage. Waiting for the exam result. Humiliation in a person's dream is similar to the interpretation of being blessed, because it often expresses in a dream that something will happen in the future that requires a blessing. Although it is commendable to hear greetings in a dream, interpreters and dreamers hate single women singing to themselves in dreams. Interpretation of a shipwreck in a married woman's dream It is commendable in a dream for a woman to hear a woman's voice singing, and if the hymns are in marriage, then in the interpretation they are like dancing and singing, and both are hated in a dream.
preview.text: The zaghrouda, or halla, is also called in the Gulf the yabab or “purring,” and the murs are the sounds made when the tongue is moved horizontally and straight inside the mouth. Women usually sing at marriages, weddings, and happy occasions such as circumcision, returning from Hajj, and commemorating the Prophet’s birthday. In other cases, women chant during times of war to motivate soldiers or when receiving the bodies of martyrs. The chant has psychological meanings in a dream, as it expresses the release of negative energy hidden in the depths of the human soul, and the interpretation of chants in a dream depends on the mood of the dreamer and sometimes according to the spiritual or cultural structure that forms consciousness or awareness. The general interpretation of ululations in a dream: Female worship goes back to an ancient pagan tradition where Women with strong, beautiful necks used to chant as a form of praise to the gods. As for the Levant, women chant the word “Aha,” which carries a blessing, in the Syriac and Aramaic languages. It is called “Mahaha”, which means begging and its origin is the call of camels for food. The dream is an indication of goodness or livelihood, if it is performed in a beautiful and harmonious voice. The inhabitants of North Africa (Egypt, Libya, Tunisia, Algeria, and Morocco) have known the song since the time of the Berbers as a form of expression of joy and happiness, and Homer mentioned it, expressing his great admiration for this phenomenon, which was not the case. familiar. To the Greeks and Romans. According to the modern psychological approach familiar in anthropology, worship is considered a positive symbol in dreams for several reasons, the first of which is that it releases negative energy when heard or played, and thus charges the soul with alternative energy that pushes it towards optimism. A trigger in a dream expresses happiness or joy in the future. A trigger in the Arab region is common among women and is a form of expression of joy. A trigger in a dream can indicate marriage or a near marriage, and it can also indicate success, superiority, or something similar. Bad in a pregnant woman’s dream. In some Arab cities and capitals, especially in the Maghreb, women utter three loud screams to express their joy at the birth of a man. The sounds are loud and multiple because the baby, God willing, will be a boy. It is as if he is coming from afar, so the child, God willing, will be a female, and God knows best. Interpretation of morals in a single dreamThe zaghrouda or ring in a single dream is a positive sign, because it sometimes expresses good news on the way to it, and sometimes the zaghrouda indicates engagement or close marriage. Waiting for the result of an exam. Humiliation in a person’s dream is similar to the interpretation of being blessed, because it often expresses in the dream that something will happen in the future that requires a blessing. Although it is praiseworthy to hear greetings in a dream, interpreters and dreamers hate single women singing For themselves in dreams. Interpretation of shipwreck in a married woman’s dream: It is praiseworthy in a dream for a woman to hear a woman’s voice while she is singing. If the chanting is in marriage, then in the interpretation it is like dancing and singing, and both of them are disliked in the dream. unless

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing someone I know in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone I know: When we see people we love in a dream, we feel joy and happiness, and this can happen because of our repeated thinking or our constant longing for them, and many people see this in their dreams. In this article, all the explanations will be explained in detail.Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone I know.Interpretation of dreams about seeing someone I know and this person was really dead and the dreamer got a lot of money and good deeds from him in his dream.If the dreamer sees someone he knows crying without screaming in the dream, and this person In reality, he suffers from many worries in his life and faces many crises and problems. This vision tells him that all this will end soon and he will live contentment and happiness. In the coming days. Interpretation of dreams of seeing someone I know by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing someone I know single as evidence of how much she loves and thinks about that man in her life. If an unmarried girl sees someone she knows looking at her in a dream with a look that expresses responsibility, this may symbolize That he is really angry with her and wants to blame her. Seeing a man she knows and looking forward to smiling in a dream may indicate a feeling of comfort and stability in one’s life. Seeing the dreamer is someone he knows and looking at him and looking sad in a dream, this is an indication of this person’s feeling of unhappiness in his life Because he was exposed to bad things, he should ask him and stand by him. In this period. Seeing a pregnant woman who knows that she is placing his hand on her stomach in a dream, this could be a warning sign for him to take care of her health condition. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a person I know about single people. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream someone she knows at home and he smiles, this symbolizes the extent of her connection With this man in reality and the completion of their good relationship. Interpretation of dreams for someone I know: I see a single woman and I talk to her enthusiastically. This may indicate a separation between her and this person, or there may be a misunderstanding between them. If she dreams of an unmarried girl talking to someone she knows and feeling happy, this may symbolize that she will receive many good things and benefits in the coming period. Interpretation of dreams to enter the house of someone I know For a single woman: If an unmarried girl enters the house of someone she knows well and the house was very beautiful in her dream, this is one of the welcome visions for her because she will hear a lot of happy news in the coming period and there will be positive changes in her life. Interpretation of dreams to enter the house of someone I know for a single woman and this person was From her family members, this indicates that he will propose marriage to her soon. If she enters the house of someone she knows and the house is in bad condition in a dream, this may indicate that she is experiencing negative changes in her life and she will feel sad and upset because of that. Interpretation of a dream about talking to someone I know about being single. If An unmarried woman saw herself talking to a young man she knows and loves in her dream, this indicates how much she loves him and is attached to him, and if he is looking at her with a smile, it also shows her an idea for her. Seeing a single girl as someone who looked at her with a smile

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing red curtains in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing red curtains in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing curtains covering all the windows of the house indicates hiding the secrets of the house. Also, seeing curtains in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates a fair marriage with the girl whom the man loves as well as the girl. Putting red curtains on all Windows for the fortune teller indicate that the dreamer’s life will change for the better and in a new world, and God knows best. Seeing white curtains in a dream indicates stability, reassurance, psychological comfort for the pioneer, and abundant sustenance, God willing. Red curtains in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is hanging curtains on all the windows of the house, This vision indicates that she will get married soon. Also, seeing red curtains in a single girl’s dream indicates many differences that she will encounter in her life. Rather, seeing hanging curtains in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her lover’s betrayal of her, their marriage, and then divorce. Seeing red curtains indicates many fears in her life and her distance from a close person in her life. Interpretation of seeing red curtains in a dream for a married woman. Likewise, seeing a married woman hanging red curtains in a dream indicates her disobedience to her husband in reality. But if he sees that he is washing the curtains, This vision indicates that their home will change and they will move to a better place. Seeing white curtains indicates protection, health, abundance of food and blessing, as well as education and superiority over their children. Interpretation of seeing red curtains in a pregnant woman’s dream: If a pregnant woman dreams that she is cleaning the hanging curtains, this means that she She will give birth and give birth to a male child. Likewise, seeing a pregnant woman with red curtains in large quantities indicates a sin and sins that she has not repented of, and God knows best. Likewise, if a woman sees that she is putting the curtains in the trash, this indicates that all her sorrows and problems between her and her husband will stop. Interpretation of seeing red curtains in the trash. A dream for a man: If a single man sees in his dream that he is saying to hang the curtains, this indicates his imminent marriage to the girl he loves. In addition to seeing a married man buying red curtains in general, this is evidence of the collapse of his worries on the ground. Also, seeing a person throwing the curtains in Garbage indicates his repentance to God Almighty and the removal of his problems, God willing. Seeing curtains in a young man’s dream means that he has entered into a new job and opened the door to his livelihood. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: The two most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin for seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing it

preview.html: Seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing it is one of the mysterious visions that carry in its details many interpretations, some of which are from Mahmoud’s interpretation, foretelling many good things, and others are only a warning of imminent dangers and troubles that may befall the dreamer or one of his family members. Therefore, seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing it has many meanings. Unwanted interpretations and many other interpretations that depend on many factors such as the color and shape of the scorpion, as well as the state in which it is in the dream. Seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing it. Interpretation of a dream about a scorpion and killing it is a way out of the bad psychological state that surrounded the viewer and his thinking due to the many difficult events that he went through. In the previous period. Killing the scorpion also indicates getting rid of the powerful sultan who was a force of oppression and oppression for the pioneer and many around him, but in the end he will overcome him and return the people to their stolen rights. If the fortuneteller kills the scorpion and then eats it, he will recover completely from all the diseases that afflicted him in the past. The past period, whether psychological or physical. As for the one who hits the scorpion with a sharp object several times to get rid of it, he is a strong-willed person who will finally be able to get rid of his controlling fears, and begin important and meaningful steps that will benefit him in it. Life. The scorpion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the scorpion is often associated with dark evil spirits due to the large number of evils, grudges and grudges to which they are exposed, so they cause harm whenever they approach a person, even those close to them are not safe. He also believes that eating a scorpion indicates obscene talk It comes out like bullets from the mouth of the fortuneteller who hurts those around him and harms those around him, distinguishes between friends and lovers, and cauterizes people in their absence without thinking. This specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type online dream interpretation site on Google. Seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing an unmarried woman. For single people, scorpions are a strong warning in all respects, perhaps because the dreamer has a degree of naivety and a good heart. If an unmarried woman sees that she is killing a scorpion, this indicates That she overcame all obstacles and achieved her goals and dreams for which she always fought and fought. As for the light scorpion, it indicates a malicious friend who will harm her, reveal her secrets to the public, and delve into her biography in her absence, so she must beware of this friend. When she sees a scorpion approaching her, she runs away from him to save herself. A good sign that the Lord (swt) will save her from a person with evil intentions who pretends to love and tenderly love her. To deceive. Seeing a scorpion in a dream and killing a married woman. To dream of a scorpion for a married woman expresses the many responsibilities and burdens that she is bearing at the present time and that put her in a disturbed and unstable mood. If the scorpion approaches her, this is a sign that there are dangers around the dreamer and he is trying to destabilize her life, which is full of gifts and is trying Harming her to destroy her completely. As for the woman,
